nodes.documentation:
@dev Adds an extra message to the BlockPoem.
@param _extraMessage The poem's extra message text.
nodes.name: addMessage

nodes.documentation: @dev Increments the BlockPoem's number of likes and adds a fan to its mapping.
nodes.name: like

nodes.documentation: @dev Donates ether to the BlockPoem's writer.
nodes.name: donate
